channel.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
channel.description:
Jake McCullum was an up and coming rider through the ranks of 85cc racing. But, on the 27th of September, he was critically injured. He fractured 3 vertebrates in his neck. His Uncle and Family made a video for him. I don't know Jake, but I know his friend from Motocross.com.
Here's the video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-mhEmzXGVq4
He has made some progress since the accident with movement in his arms, not yet able to move his hands, but has feeling in them, also has some lower body feeling which are all great signs.
Pray for Jake.
- All for 64

item.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

deoxys505:

riding is very dangerous…i have a 80cc 2-stroke honda dirt bike and i got a 125 yamaha for christmas…their very powerful…and you gotta be careful…about 3 yrs ago the night b4 thanksgiving my brother was riding a little 45cc gas scooter and fell off and had a cuncussion(sp?) and a broken collarbone (they only do 15mph)

Exactly. It’s bloody dangerous.

Read full topic

item.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:13, topic:38192”][quote author=Aukake link=topic=53905.msg669415#msg669415 date=1166845004]
We ride and never worry about the fall. Just the cowboy in us all.
[/quote]

Shut up you idiot… riding crappy little bikes makes you a cowboy … lmfao.[/quote]

Hey dipshit. Get your fat ass off that fucking computer and go listen to the song called “Cowboy In Me” by Tim McGraw, which is where that line came from. Riding crappy little bikes doesn’t make me a cowboy, but you saying that makes you a dumbass. What in the fuck is wrong with everyone nowadays? You’re all acting like a bunch of niggers, the world don’t owe you shit, stop being mad at everything and anything for no reason.

Read full topic

For example, I was born.

item.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:19, topic:38192”][quote author=wonderguy6 link=topic=53905.msg670397#msg670397 date=1166856026]
I dont fuking belive tht you fucking cunts dont care about this boy how the hell would you like it if you were in a weelchair the rest of your life @ 13!!! thats so sad to think that especilly at christmas…

Obvusly You dont care about anyone exeot yourself.
[/quote]

Ok, it’s sad… sorta, but if he was “riding” then he should have fully acknowledged the risks in doing so. So should his friends and family, so there is nothing to truly be sad about.

I mention it is sad because you people keep posting things like:

Please, if you support Jake McCullum, put in your Signiture:

  • All for 64.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 07:42:27 PM[/size][hr]At the moment I’m a bit heart-broken. My friend, fighting for his future in walking.

Why be sad. Be happy he is even alive.[/quote]
Believe me, I’m happy he’s alive. But I’m really sad that it could happen to such a nice kid. Shit things always happen to good people.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 10:40:25 PM[/size][hr][quote=“zoss0, post:21, topic:38192”]@PaulT what if you like snap your neck and your a paraplegic?[/quote]
Who says he’s a paraplegic? He could still be a Quadriplegic.

Read full topic

item.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:8, topic:38192”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=53905.msg667076#msg667076 date=1166820342]

If there wasn’t the risk of sudden death/mutilation then it wouldn’t be a fun sport. So even if god did exist, I wouldn’t pray for this kid. Besides, he’s going to spend hundreds of thousands of your tax dollars fighting to survive; just so he can be another brain dead retarded kid. Great, exactly what your backward economy needs, another sinkhole.

and How do you know God Doesn’t exist?

Ya really?
[/quote]Cause it’s not possible. Go look at the thread “A good read” posted by jme.

But seriously Paul, that was sick. I really hope he gets better.[/quote]
It is possible. You should come to my old school. They give like evidence that you can’t say no to. Btw i’m a christian so…yea.
My prayers out to you Jake.
@PaulT what if you like snap your neck and your a paraplegic?

Read full topic

item.title: Jake McCullum, In Our Prayers
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’m not to keen on the fact you don’t want to pray for him. I don’t believe in God either. But I want him to get better. He’s 13 years-old. And to think he’ll spend the rest of his life in a wheelchair if he doesn’t get better. I’d like some of my families money to go towards helping him. And so does my family.

Read full topic
